title: American Sociological Review - The Wealth Inequality of Nations
itunes:title: American Sociological Review - The Wealth Inequality of Nations
description: Authors Fabian T. Pfeffer and Nora Waitkus discuss their article, "The Wealth Inequality of Nations," published in the August 2021 issue of American Sociological Review.
